name: Domovoi
movement: walk 30 ft., teleport up to 120 ft.
description: The Domovoi is a medium-sized fey creature known for its chaotic nature, utilizing magical abilities to guard household spaces. It possesses a strong physical presence and can become invisible, enhancing its capabilities as a guardian.
memorable: Its ability to teleport within protected structures and its use of spells like darkness and haste provide strategic control over its surroundings.
goals: To protect household spaces and intimidate intruders.
relations: Often found in homes, it may be related to or serve other fey creatures.
environment: Mostly encountered in domestic settings or rural areas.
strengths: High strength for melee attacks, strong spellcasting using Charisma, and the ability to teleport.
attacks: Makes two Slam attacks dealing bludgeoning damage with a solid to-hit bonus.
most_powerful_ability: Invisibility allows it to ambush foes or reposition without being targeted.
skills: Has proficiency in Intimidation, which it uses effectively to intimidate intruders.
additional_information: Immune to acid and lightning damage
Can magically protect a structure and grant limited effects
Utilizes spells like alter self, darkness, and haste
Visually dramatic teleportation effects when using Protector’s Step
spellcasting: Can cast spells using Charisma as a modifier; can alter its form or create areas of magical darkness.
test_queries: chaotic creature that can cast darkness
strong melee and spellcasting fey guardian
